data.title: Racing Video Games | 19
data.meta_description: Page 19. Racing video games sorted by popularity among gamers. Racers are straightforward â€“ cross the finish line first. These games let you race anyything from WRC cars, RC toys, quads, and firetrucks.
data.text:
Manx TT Super Bike

Racing 01 September 1997

Arcade motorcycle races, which were originally published (in 1995) for gaming lovers. Two years later, two parallel conversions were produced, one of which went into the hands of the owners of Sega Saturn consoles, the other went to PeCety.

PC

Sunny Race

Racing 24 November 2005

Sunny Race is a car race realized in an arcade style. We are dealing here with a very simplified model of vehicle control and huge, usually unprecedented speeds of movement of these machines.

PC

Sega GT 2002

Racing 02 September 2002

Continuation of the Sega GT in response to the cult Gran Turismo series. More than 100 vehicles to choose from (including many older models of cars) and an extensive career mode - these are the main advantages of this production.

XBOX

Apex

Racing 17 February 2003

Innovative and relatively complex car races, in which we not only win another competition, but also run a company producing sports cars. The game is also distinguished by its detailed visual setting.

XBOX

Army Racer

Racing 19 August 2005

The second title of the Hungarian company 576 media, which appeared on the European market. Like the previous Road To Fame, this is an arcade racing game, but this time our struggle takes place in various military facilities.

PC

Quantum Redshift

Racing 16 September 2002

Quantum Redshift is a position that allows players to crush futuristic ships on extremely winding routes. Add defensive and offensive weapons and you will get a typical future racer. The Xbox equivalent of WipeOut Fusion was conceived by Curly Monsters studio and released by Microsoft.

XBOX

Maluch Racer

Racing 25 August 2003

Car races devoted to the legendary Fiat 126p car, which for years has been used by Polish society as a commercial, off-road and racing car.

PC

Downtown Run

Racing 28 March 2003

A dynamic racing game created by Ubisoft Studios. Production is based on arcade rather than simulation gameplay. We have at our disposal a number of branded cars, such as Audi TT or Ford Mustang. We compete in the title city centres and large agglomerations. On each track we can find bonuses to help you gain an advantage over your opponents.

PCPS2

Hugo: Bukkazoom!

Racing 17 September 2003

Hugo: The Bukkazoom is another family game whose hallmark is a child-friendly troll named after Hugo. This time our hero and friends are reduced to inconspicuous size. This allows them to take part in miniature car races.

PCPS2GBA

Jacked

Racing 10 February 2006

Jacked is an arcade game, the essence of which are crazy motorcycle duels. Speed and driving style are a secondary aspect of the struggle - the priority is to eliminate enemies as effectively as possible with a variety of firearms, grenades, fire extinguishers, Molotov cocktails or simply kicks.

PCPS2XBOXGCN

Sonic Riders

Racing 17 March 2006

Sonic Riders are arcade races featuring the title blue hedgehog and other heroes of the popular platformer series developed by Sega. The plot of the game focuses on the struggle for Emerald Chaos, the main prize in the tournament organized by the cunning Doctor Eggman. Guided by the character's actions, the player participates in spectacular races on jet boards, performing crazy stunts and fighting with rivals.

PCPS2XBOXGCN

RPM Tuning

Racing 23 July 2004

RPM Tuning allows amateur riders to take part in a series of night-time illegal races and to freely tune their cars.

PCPS2XBOX

Circus Maximus: Chariot Wars

Racing 24 February 2002

Circus Maximus: Chariot Wars studio Kodiak Interactive is an action game, combining elements of racing and fighting. The creators of the title were inspired, among others, by the film Ben-Hur and Gladiator. The plot takes us to ancient Rome, in the times of the great Olympics. We play the role of a competitor taking part in chariot races.

PS2XBOX

SPOGS Racing

Racing 02 February 2008

SPOGS Racing is a rather unusual race. The role of a car is played by a tyre with a disc inserted in it, which shows our virtual image.

PCPSPWii

Midway Arcade Treasures 3

Racing 27 September 2005

Midway Arcade Treasures 3 is another, third compilation of Midway's greatest hits, which appeared on coin-op machines in the course of several years. By bringing together the "classics" in one place, the set manufacturers remind younger computer and console users of the once great productions.

PS2XBOXGCN

Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Remix

Racing 13 March 2006

Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Remix is a race from Rockstar Games, the company responsible for the controversial Grand Theft Auto series, among other things. According to the authors, the special edition of MC3 is an award for long-term fans of the series.

PS2XBOX

Hot Wheels Stunt Track Challenge

Racing 13 April 2004

Another game from THQ's series, in which the player sits behind the wheel of one of the Hot Wheels cars. As the title indicates, it is mainly based on performing crazy acrobatics.

PCPS2XBOXGBA

Supercar Street Challenge

Racing 22 October 2001

The Supercar Street Challenge is a fast car race with an arcade style. Players take part in a number of demanding rallies located in the world's major metropolises.

PCPS2

Crash Nitro Kart

Racing 11 November 2003

Crazy races with well-known fans of the series of characters in the leading roles. Crazy fun for the youngest. The game offers expanded singleleplayer and equally interesting multiplayer.

PS2XBOXGBAGCN

Lamborghini FX

Racing canceled

Lamborghini FX is an arcade racing game, which was created thanks to the joint efforts of development teams: Titus Interactive (creator of the Crazy Cars series) and Milestone (Screamer cycle).

PCPS2XBOXGCN
